snippet: Among other costs were 6.6 million lost workdays, $2 billion for back pay, and a loss of 120,000 private-sector jobs, the White House budget office said.
abstract: White House budget office details costs of 16-day partial government shutdown; among other costs were 6.6 million lost workdays, $2 billion for back pay, and a loss of 120,000 private-sector jobs.
lead_paragraph: Among other costs were 6.6 million lost workdays, $2 billion for back pay, and a loss of 120,000 private-sector jobs, the White House budget office said.

headline.main: White House Puts Price on Government Shutdown
headline.print_headline: White House Puts Price On Government Shutdown
